website_summaries.verdict: A quality wine opener in a simple but durable design.
pros: Although the style is based off a simple wing design, it stands out for being sturdy and a good value for its price
It is durable and easy to operate
cons: Occasionally consumers received defective products, and a few were less satisfied with the overall design

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had initially given this product a 5 star rating. It seemed to be of good quality, but within 6 months it fell apart and is totally useless. The seller offers a "lifetime warranty" but for the life of me, I can't figure out how to contact them. I have easily contacted other sellers before, but they seem to have managed to somehow make it impossible to do.
customer_reviews.author: steveszat

customer_reviews.title: Decent construction, somewhat more difficult than normal to use
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be decent construction, but a little more difficult to use than other brands of this device. Specifically,the spike which sticks into the cork does not start threading until you have jammed it in pretty far, which can lead to just tearing up the top of the cork rather than screwing into it. In order to avoid this, take care to apply SIGNIFICANT downward force while turning the handle, at least until the screw has a good hold. The stopper is a nice addition, and it functions well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sometime last month. We drink a lot of wine and we were going through the cheap openers quickly so I got this. It’s been exactly 6 bottles and now one of the levers is stuck and won’t come down. We store it hanging up above the sink so it can’t be from misuse. All in all it was easy to use when we first got it but now it’s useless.
customer_reviews.author: Divina

customer_reviews.title: 3-1/2 stars maybe....
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed. This is made from cheap pot metal that won’t last all that long. At least the rubberized coating makes it not look like it’s not dollar store stuff. If you use it much you’ll be replacing it in a couple of years. I’ve been down this road before. It does work ok. After a time the cheap pot metal breaks or the plastic bottle neck guide breaks. If you are a regular wine drinker LOOK ELSEWHERE. From the reviews I was expecting a little bit better quality. Darn, foiled again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little wary of the quality as it is so affordable. Same great quality and durability as more expensive ones. Great to finally not have to PULL the cork out like we had to do with our old simple one.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable
customer_reviews.text: Nothing outstanding here, but it basically works. I had my old wine opener for 30 years, and it was perfect until one day, its metallic supports simply broke in two and it bit the dust. This wine opener is a little loose in its works, and I feel I need to be very careful using it. But the corkscrew works very well, and considering how lousy most things are made today, I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: m-chan

customer_reviews.title: Corkscrew Bottle Opener
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I have broken so many. This one is much stronger and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Opener, Multiple Uses!
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle and wine opener. Does the job. Cheap, easy to use and good quality. Definitely a bonus that it comes with a cap for your wine so it doesnt go bad. My old one broke and this was a great new one to buy. Would definitely recommend to get this if you dont have one at home.
customer_reviews.author: Randy S.

customer_reviews.title: Good value !
customer_reviews.text: This wine bottle opener is good value with this price ! It as good as the expensive one which I bought !
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Wine cork removers come in handy
customer_reviews.text: Just what he needed hubby likes a bottle of red wine once in a while
customer_reviews.author: Rita Beeman

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay...
customer_reviews.text: The wine opener is good so far but the wine plug that came with it is starting to peel after after 1 week! I thought it was stainless steel at first but turned out to be plastic with metallic paint over it
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality soft metals bend during use - junk
customer_reviews.text: The metal quality is very poor!. This is advertised as a professional corkscrew. But the handles were bent and twisted after some weeks of normal home use with standard wine bottles. Do not buy this corkscrew. It’s junk.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Haley

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I've got broken wine keys in my drawer and I got sick of pushing corks into my bottles, so I bought a fancy wine bottle opener. It works, it's shiny, and the stopper keeps my champagne and/or wine bottles crisp. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Paris

customer_reviews.title: Makes opening the bottle less stressful?
customer_reviews.text: My very Swedish wife refers to this opener as the "Gym Teacher". I believe this is a gym teacher that we all can stand behind! But seriously it works well....
customer_reviews.author: armando

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Very flimsy and weak
customer_reviews.text: Big and bulky compared to other ones and not sturdy at all. Have to do 2 or 3 attempts around the top of a beer bottle to get it off. Wish I could return
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome wine opener and makes opening wine bottles so much ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome wine opener and makes opening wine bottles so much easier and faster. I love the extra wine stopper it brings. It's super convenient. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not use if you want to reuse the cork!
customer_reviews.text: The corkscrew chews up the cork something fierce. Can't reuse the cork, and the stopper that comes with it is useless. It will not stay on the bottle. I used it and the next day the stopper had come loose, useless.
customer_reviews.author: Sumthingfierce

customer_reviews.title: Love the multi uses
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! It works perfectly and it was a great purchase and addition to my bar!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristal Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Rather cheaply made despite their claims. Actual screw assembly a bit short and the mechanism does not move freely. Not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: vector59

customer_reviews.title: Okay Product
customer_reviews.text: I thought this opener would be easier and more sufficient when opening but it wasn’t any better than the Cheaper wine opener I already owned, disappointed in the opener.
customer_reviews.author: laluleelu

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value deal, well built and I really liked that it comes with a high quality bottle stopper.
customer_reviews.author: DerekE

customer_reviews.title: Wine opener is OK. I feel the spiral blade ...
customer_reviews.text: Wine opener is OK. I feel the spiral blade could extend a little longer to allow you to pull the cork off easier.
customer_reviews.author: +DMNJ+

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Wine Opener
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wine opener I have ever purchased!! The bottle stopper is also attractive and works perfectly. Excellent quality and vaue!
customer_reviews.author: J. Zaleski

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy !
customer_reviews.text: Love this ! Very classy look with the black and silver. Sturdy opener. Will last forever !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Guest

customer_reviews.title: Can find better
customer_reviews.text: Multiple people and bottles with no success. Had to buy a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Really great and easy to use. I can't use a waiter corkscrew... but this is so easy! It's also lasted me years with no sign of wear! (And it has opened a lot of bottles...)
customer_reviews.author: Toriy24

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really sturdy and heavier than I thought it was going to be! I was also worried that the opener would be thrown around in the box, but the packaging was great.
customer_reviews.author: Clon107

customer_reviews.title: defective request replacement
customer_reviews.text: I only used for just over a month and it is not working due to defective mechanisms I would like a replacement since I am unable to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used to date.
customer_reviews.text: The corkscrew was bent when received but straightened it out and it's good as new. Verry easy to use. The screw itself has sharp edges so it cuts thru the cork instead of the roundedness of most screws. What a difference that makes!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Love This Type
customer_reviews.text: I like this type. Have several cause keep being misplaced by others. Nice weight & pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ridley

customer_reviews.title: Nice product! This is the best wing-style corkscrew I ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product! This is the best wing-style corkscrew I have ever owned. It's easy to remove both synthetic and natural corks. Great metal quality.
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: Stopper.  No no
customer_reviews.text: Bottle opener. Works like one should. The stopper however is worthless
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: It came obviously used
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. I’m happy with the product itself. However, the packaging was stapled and clearly repackaged from a previous return. There are a couple of nics on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not heavy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: do the job. not heavy and easy to use. the bottle stopper somehow cannot be tightly screwed to the bottle - just loosely hanging there. overall it is ok purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Pico

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: great product, great price. Works well, very heavy and sturdy. Fast shipping, 5 stars for this seller. Thanks for making my wine evening a more simple effort.
customer_reviews.author: goldendk

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Such a nice heavy duty wine opener! And it comes with a stopper! This is everything I need. And it works well!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Wine stopper fits perfectly into wine bottles. I hate when wine stoppers are a little too big and never fit that well. This one fits great! The wine opener is your generic wine opener and works well. It has rubber ends which is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: sit by the fire with a nice glass of wine
customer_reviews.text: sit by the fire with a nice glass of wine. but you have to have a corkscrew and this is it
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Bousquet

customer_reviews.title: Happy and Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: The Wine Opener is spot on very sturdy easy to use very satisfied. Problem is once again 2 days late on expected delivery date as usual these days a guaranteed delivery should be just that, if not stop advertising 2 day shipping....
customer_reviews.author: James Foster

customer_reviews.title: Know what you will get, this is a very ...
customer_reviews.text: Know what you will get, this is a very cheap opener, photos look fancy but this is as cheap as it gets.
customer_reviews.author: miguel

customer_reviews.title: they said the wine opener works great but the stopper is very loose and isn't air ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift....they said the wine opener works great but the stopper is very loose and isn't air tight. Otherwise they would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Hug life

customer_reviews.title: Feels like expensive metal.
customer_reviews.text: Feels heavy, not some cheap material. Also the metal wine cork fits well and keeps it sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Yesuf

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid set. First, the wine opener works easily and perfectly. Then, no leaks. The wine stopper is perfect and kept things air tight for storage in the fridge. The only downside is that it's fairly large and heavy but that's a reasonable tradeoff for a quality corkscrew. Best corkscrew opener ever.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cork opener. Stopper no good.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the cork opener. Stopper would not stop wine from leaking out when bottle was laid down. Cork opener is excellent. Order without stopper. New corks are a better buy.
customer_reviews.author: David Whitis

customer_reviews.title: 5 months after purchase, daily use, Still going ...
customer_reviews.text: 5 months after purchase, daily use, Still going strong. This is a big deal because. ....... So many others have broken at the screw part. Even more expensive ones. UPDATE: 8 months in, and it has started to falter.... However due to how affordable it is and how very simple it is to use, I will order another.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Well made corkscrew
customer_reviews.text: Good product!!! Perfect and easy wine bottle opener. And the screw fits in perfectly. I have a couple of types of arthritis that affects my hands and this makes removing a cork easy. It works well on any bottle with corks of average size or slight larger/smaller! Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Dikla Havlicek

customer_reviews.title: Yippee
customer_reviews.text: Yippee I actually was able to open a bottle of wine with ease..love the bottle stopper that also was included. I'm a happy wino..lol
customer_reviews.author: Ginette Gerbothney

customer_reviews.title: Stop working after a year
customer_reviews.text: It was fine while it worked, but it stopped working in about a year. Very disappointed. Will not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Perez

customer_reviews.title: awesome gift!
customer_reviews.text: made for a great housewarming gift for a friend of mine!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Love the wine stopper. The wine corkscrew works well and appears to be well-made. Would recommend as a great manual corkscrew opener.
customer_reviews.author: AceRulz

customer_reviews.title: Nice and strong
customer_reviews.text: its pretty good. i really liked it. i never thought it will be so strong.
customer_reviews.author: Bubun

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but kind of light weight and loose feeling
customer_reviews.author: suzi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and works like a charm. Just what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.author: The Tompanman GnomeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great cork screw
customer_reviews.text: Makes it really easy to get your wine bottle open
customer_reviews.author: Janice Weidenbach

customer_reviews.title: I think its not sharp enough? doesn't work!!
customer_reviews.text: All it does is ruin and dig around a bit in the cork. doesnt really screw in and get gripped up. I 've went back to using my swiss knife coz it works better than this :(
customer_reviews.author: patel

customer_reviews.title: Time to whine down!
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. It's a flimsy, but you have to get used to it!
customer_reviews.author: PoundPuppy1981

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with the bottle topper as it said it would.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done, but it’s feels cheaply designed. I don't expect it to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Made with heavy sturdy material.
customer_reviews.text: Item received quickly and as expected. Made with heavy sturdy material.
customer_reviews.author: Anh

customer_reviews.title: been less than 2 months
customer_reviews.text: the wine opening part still works but the bottle opener part broke within 2 months
customer_reviews.author: pj

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but beer opener bent after serveral usages. Wine plug is useless
customer_reviews.author: Duc Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Mechanically speaking this works just like it should
customer_reviews.text: Mechanically speaking this works just like it should. This thing smells really bad. It’s got a weird and potent metallic smell that fills the room. Yes, I know this is made out of metal, but none of my tools cans stink up a room like this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the weight/sturdiness of this opener for the price. Very nice. :)
customer_reviews.author: Robin L. Bender

customer_reviews.title: Really poor quality - top broke in first week.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last week and used the top part to open a bottle of beer. The bottle opener part bent and then broke. Really poor quality. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tool couldn’t catch the cork. It ground the cork ...
customer_reviews.text: Tool couldn’t catch the cork. It ground the cork making a mess with cork bits going everywhere. Was not successful in opening wine bottle. Had to switch to another wine opener. Disappointing and messy.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: this is a good quality product with cheap price. The feeling in the hand is really good. Easy to turn and open. good product.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cork screw is not as sharp and requires some muscle to uncork the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Squiggle wiggle and unworthy
customer_reviews.text: I know it’s an $8 bottle opener, but I was really hopping for a better design and ergonomic feel. Slipped and wiggled a little too much. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cap on the stopper is cross-threaded and doesn't stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cool kit. The set weighs heavy and feels quality. Easy to use with added feature.

customer_reviews.title: Opened first bottle of beer, and glossy metal laminate ...
customer_reviews.text: Opened first bottle of beer, and glossy metal laminate came off, started to rust. At the same time it bent, flexible and gives in. Hardly openned the beer!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wilson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Opener arrived in a jostled package and the wine stopper was missed
customer_reviews.author: Dijuana Lewis

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The corkscrew part is too thick - it just digs a messy hole in the cork.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Okay product. Not particularly impressed. Still takes a ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay product. Not particularly impressed. Still takes a couple if tries with this appliance to get wine cork extracted from the bottle neck.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kay Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Corkscrew is fine but after leaving the stopper in a bottle of ...
customer_reviews.text: Corkscrew is fine but after leaving the stopper in a bottle of wine for a few weeks, the chrome coating started to peel and ruined the bottle of wine. Stopper is unusable as the chrome is now peeling/flaking off.
customer_reviews.author: neil b.

customer_reviews.title: Came without the stopper
customer_reviews.text: I feel so cheated. There was no wine stopper. I havent even opened the package and it has the space for the stopper but no stopper in sight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Habitual Corkscrew User
customer_reviews.text: I went on a search for a corkscrew that will last my wine habit so I consider myself a corkscrew connoisseur. I have gone through countless corkscrews and so far this is the best one. The screw goes into the cork easily and you are able to pull the cork with little effort. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Only got 2 uses out of it before it broke
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine the 1st two uses. When I used it the 3rd time the "neck" (part that you twist into the cork) dropped down. Levers won't fold up in order to squeeze down to extract the cork. Very disappointed that I only got 2 uses out of this. The paperwork says "THIS PRODUCT IS GUARANTEED AGAINST DEFECTIVE MATERIALS AND WORKMANSHIP." So will your company be replacing it?? What steps need to be taken to get the "guarantee" honored? REVIEW UPDATE: Seller contacted me & issued a refund thus honoring the guarantee. Changing my review to 5☆ due to immediate assistance & no hassle.
customer_reviews.author: MAI

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy
customer_reviews.text: The mechanism had a loose and shoddy feeling to it. This wine opener has a bottle opener feature as well. The bottle opener broke the glass (just below the cap) on a 12 oz bottle of Beck's. It is ill-suited to opening bottles. It's a wine opener ... so what? Guests will use the bottle opener feature as well and will likely experience similar results. Do you want to risk having a guest swallow a piece of glass? As an alternative, you may consider the OXO line of wine openers.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Rusts and contains LEAD- DANGER
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend this item. As you can see in the photos it’s not a great quality unit. The stopper had a massive wad of rust on it, and when we tested both units for lead they can back positive. The unit is actually down right deadly since it’s being used in food. Reporting to amazon.
customer_reviews.author: N and S

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. I am partially paralyzed in my right hand/arm and I can use this.
customer_reviews.author: Copper

customer_reviews.title: THis is far better than the cheap ones they offer in grocery stores
customer_reviews.text: My original opener broke and I've been looking for a really high end quality one. THis is far better than the cheap ones they offer in grocery stores. Those will open a bottle of wine or two or more but eventually the handles or the screw breaks right off. So this one is a big step up, but it doesn't feel like high end quality. It is lightweight metal and the mechanism isn't really smooth like the older ones. For the price, its ok.
customer_reviews.author: Beatle

customer_reviews.title: Great  corkscrew!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice wine opener, I like that it’s so easy to use and it’s dirty and good quality. I think it’s gonna last a really long time. I like that they gave me a little present with it, it’s a stainless steel cork to use after you open the bottle. That was a really nice thing. The price was right. I’m happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: SLTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I needed a quick replacement to my old wine opener. At first glance...it looked larger than expected, cheap, and heavier than expected. HOWEVER...it works really well!! Any novice could open a bottle with it. It's a little clunky (something sounds loose) sounding, but you can't beat the price and absolutely works! I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: This item is extremely heavy duty, seemingly high-quality. While the quality is still very good I feel like the moving parts don’t all work smoothly together and it feels a little jankie during use. I have used this only once and it’s possible I still need to break it in a little bit more. I will update my review if I have a different experience next time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: chamkilistar

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This thing is solid, bought it specifically to open up wine bottles. The double handle motion is great, makes getting those corks out a breeze. As a plus it brings a stopper and even a bottle opener for beers. For the price, this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Stugi

customer_reviews.title: Works great, however....
customer_reviews.text: This works great! However, it seems like the handles get misaligned for some reason? So, since they are misaligned from the top, it's awkward to get started. i tried to adjust them with no luck. Otherwise works great.
customer_reviews.author: N. Demanuele

customer_reviews.title: Damages corks + Cork pieces fall into the wine
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a pretty solid product, but after using it about a dozen times, it causes significant damage to the cork and allows small chunks of cork to get into the wine each time. I'm guessing this is why the stopper is included, because I wouldn't reuse a cork that was originally pulled out with this device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I love this style of wine bottle opener. For my arthritic hands it requires very little hand strength to use. I really like the stopper as it keeps the wine nice and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Greimes

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of those fancy openers - which turned out to be a hassle and fell apart after two years - so I'm back to basics. This one is easy to uncork the wine and easy to get the cork off - unlike the fancy one. I'm expecting to have this corkscrew for many years.
customer_reviews.author: On My Feet

customer_reviews.title: Strong Multi-Use Opener
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to re-cork a bottle of wine yet but the opener is very easy to use. It is made of strong, durable materials. I use the bottle opener a lot as well because it is much easier than the other ones I have!
customer_reviews.author: KMK

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I’ve broken about 4 different wine openers. I was hoping it wouldn’t happen with this one. This one right here for the price is amazing! I love it! The bottle opener is also great. The topper also is great. Would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect and i love the stopper, it fit pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Klajdi

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: As I am not so strong, older woman, this is so easy to use to open up a bottle of wine, and I love the stopper to save the wine left in the bottle for later. Recommend hightly.
customer_reviews.author: S. French

customer_reviews.title: Works great on some but not on real cork
customer_reviews.text: Works great on some but not on real cork. Don't expect it to work on more expensive wines as it tears the cork up too much to easily pull it out. Works fine on forms made from man made materials.
customer_reviews.author: School Saver

customer_reviews.title: The bottle stopper fits loosely in a bottle and would ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottle stopper fits loosely in a bottle and would fall out if the bottle tipped over. The corkscrew works, but it feels flimsy. I don't think it will last more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Loose ball
customer_reviews.text: Corkscrew was adequate. The metal bottle stopper is made of two parts. The plug part and a screw-on top ball. The threads are poorly made and the ball simply comes loose and falls off. I had to put some silicone glue in the threaded hole in the ball and then screw in the stopper part and leave to set to be able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Ok purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The bottle opener is awesome. The stopper is no good. Tried to use it twice, but it doesn't stay in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wine opener
customer_reviews.text: Works great, it is heavy built and easy to pull the cork without the cork coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: marc999us

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: I can't make it work, not strong enough or easy enough to screw down. My husband managed it though. I wanted a really easy to use corkscrew.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kelly

product_meta.title: Foho Wine Opener, Premium Multifunctional Wing Corkscrew Wine Bottle Opener, Luxury Waiter Corkscrew with Stopper Set for Wine Enthusiast Waiters
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL - This easy to wash Wing Corkscrew and Wine Bottle Opener is constructed from zinc alloy body and stainless steel corkscrew for strength and flexibility with soft touch panels for comfort and easy grip.

EXTRA VALUE - The Foho corkscrew adds additional value as it comes with a delightful chrome plated bottle stopper. Use your bottle stopper to extend your wines life, lock in great taste and prevent any unnecessary spillage!
EASY TO USE - The designer Wing style of this corkscrew, makes it easy to grip the unfolding wings while drilling and allows for effective pulling while removing the cork.

Multiple use & A Good Gift - Ideal for any restaurant, bar, or home for a romantic evening or just a casual drink. Buy a solid heavy duty and built to last wine corkscrew as a great hostess gift for your families or good friends.
